trans-unit.source: Implements an accessible object that <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> classes use to adjust the designer user interface for users who have impairments.
trans-unit.target: 액세스할 수 있는 개체를 구현 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> 장애가 있는 사용자를 위해 디자이너 사용자 인터페이스를 조정 하기 위해 클래스가 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerAccessibleObject"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerAccessibleObject"> </xref> 클래스 지정을 사용 하 여 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> to apply to the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> 액세스 가능한 개체에 적용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the child accessible object associated with the activity designer at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 인덱스 위치에서 activity designer와 연결 된 액세스 가능한 자식 개체를 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the child accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 액세스 가능한 자식 개체의&0;부터 시작 하는 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> associated with the child <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> 자식과 연결 된 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> 지정 된 인덱스 위치에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of child accessible objects that belong to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerAccessibleObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 액세스 가능한 개체에 속하는 자식 수를 반환 된 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerAccessibleObject"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of children that belong to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerAccessibleObject"></xref>.
Gets the accessible state of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerAccessibleObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 현재 액세스할 수 있는 상태를 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerAccessibleObject"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: State has the following possible values: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>.
trans-unit.target: 상태에 다음과 같은 가능한 값: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>
